Review_title: Whoever wrote the synopsis is clearly suffering from a vaccine related stroke.
Review_Text: Good documentary that goes over the actual SCIENCE of the so called covid "vaccine". It is sad to see there are still sheep who follow every command the government issues. If you are one of these sheep people in the liberal cult, this movie isn't for you. The science will go over your head and the facts will make you angry. If you want to watch it, just make sure you put on 2 masks so you don't catch covid, it might be in the room with you right now!It's crazy to think people are dumb enough to still blindly support the pharmaceutical industry. Hopefully this movie will educate some of the cult members. 10/10.

The one size fits all medicine will one day be seen no better than what was called medicine of blood letting.This isn't even a vaccine of the past kind of inoculation. It is a gene therapy and we still play with fire of how to understand genomics. The Vax may be a lab success... but... but to mass produce it is another frontier in itself as science for quality as it was designed.When it was said the vax had to be kept frozen at minus 25 degrees to maintain suspension - that was it for me. No way it could be rolled out correctly.Why are Nano particulars of many substances now having issues? As in creating inflammation or toxic.Everything is a danger to reproductive health in CA.It's like the days when the smartest said we have invented everything and no need to discover more. This goes for Physics of Einstein or even Darwin in evolution.

Review_title: Excellent documentary about the consequences of no informed consent
Review_Text: Hard to watch this incredible documentary about the terrible state our nation is in following a fraud perpetrated by governments and Big Pharma against the people of the world to force through an experimental gene therapy. I've followed the situation closely and have a medical research background, so was able to quickly realize the shots were dangerous and refused to take any.The reality of the situation is well covered by a courageous team who included some of the worst vaccine injured and the best doctors, PhDs, politicians and others who dared to speak out. The film is well done as a documentary and highly disturbing to watch if you do fully understand what has happened.Unfortunately, so many people are still believing the same media who told them Joe Biden was "sharp as a tack", who claimed Hunter's laptop was "Russian Disinfo", who told them the vaccines were "safe and effective" while admitting that no long term or comprehensive studies exist.No informed consent. Dare yourself to watch this, if you believe everything is fine, and ask yourself why there was no informed consent for these experimental gene therapies.Yes, a lot of vaccinated people seem to be fine. I hope they are and stay that way. But that doesn't make those who got injured "faking it", etc. Everyone responds to different drugs in different ways. Epoch Times dared to look at the worst of the COVID vaccine injuries when no other newspaper would.

Excellent documentary. The lunacy of those who joyfully accepted the forced jab is mind boggling. If you're vaccinated, which we are told completely protects you from Covid... YES, THAT IS WHAT WAS REPEATED OVER AND OVER AND OVER AND OVER again, why would you cower in fear of someone who is not? Why would you FORCE someone to get the 'vaccine' and if they don't, FIRE THEM, THREATEN THEM, ATTACK THEM? That is correct, because you are ignorant.Just as the fool who states the title alone is a 'red flag' The red flag is that the reviewer (and millions of others) BLINDLY follow what the government tells them. We can see with the recent election that people blindly follow someone who LIES repeatedly.

I'm not an anti vaxxer or anti science, I don't know enough about them for my opinion to matter. But I am an expert on people, so the criminal conspiracy to cover up what they knew doesn't surprise me. Money is all that matters to rich people.I joined this site because I have cried twice in my adult life and then three times during this film. It puts a face on the vaccine injured. Maddy, then Nikki and then the one that made me lose it. Ernest. I had to hit pause.I know two people who had heart attacks soon after getting vaccinated and didn't think twice about it. In both cases it was the family who told me. One family was told he died of covid, but the autopsey said it was a heart attack. The doctors insisted the heart attack was brought on by covid, but he was negative.Well done presentation of the victims, witnesses and data. I believe we should spend time caring about what's happening to the people around us. Heartbreaking as it is, this film is a good way to do that.
